meanings.definition: Characterized by or suitable for dancing.
meanings.sent1: The dancy music made everyone want to dance at the party.
meanings.sent2: She wore a dancy dress to the ballet performance.
meanings.sent3: The dancy cat tried to mimic its owner's dance moves.
meanings.sent4: The dancy flowers swayed gracefully in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The dancy rhythm of the drums filled the room with joy.

meanings.definition: Inclined to dance or move rhythmically.
meanings.sent1: The little girl was always dancy, twirling around the room.
meanings.sent2: The dancy toddler clapped along to the music.
meanings.sent3: The dancy puppy wagged its tail in time with the music.
meanings.sent4: Her dancy feet tapped out a joyful beat on the floor.
meanings.sent5: The dancy group of friends danced together in harmony.

meanings.definition: Having a lively or energetic quality.
meanings.sent1: The dancy atmosphere of the festival was contagious.
meanings.sent2: His dancy personality always brought a smile to people's faces.
meanings.sent3: The dancy squirrel darted around the park, full of energy.
meanings.sent4: The dancy waves crashed against the shore with vigor.
meanings.sent5: The dancy laughter of the children echoed through the playground.
